fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone, dealing a Basic attack.
- Alert, shooting all your visitors for a Powerful attack and gaining basic defense.
- Guard someone other than you, giving them Basic defense and a Basic attack to one of their visitors.
- Use an ability of any Town Killing role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All abilities are single-use.
- **__Part of the Daily Streak Faction__**
